Statute.Title: Security Screening Services Commercialization Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Commercialisation des services de contrôle de sûreté, Loi sur la)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2019, c. 29, s. 270 in force on assent (21.06.2019), except

Item.Text: — ss. 16 to 23, 44 to 46 and 47(1) come into force on the transfer date, as defined in s. 2(1) of the Security Screening Services Commercialization Act — see 2019, c. 29, s. 279(1) — Not in force
— ss. 14, 24 and 37 to 42 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council — see 2019, c. 29, s. 279(4) — Not in force

NOTE: The Minister of Transport must publish in the Canada Gazette a notice of the transfer date, as defined in subsection 2(1) of the Security Screening Services Commercialization Act, as soon as feasible after that date see s. 279(3) of the Budget Implementation Act No. 1 (2019, c. 29)
